import React from "react"; import ContainerDefault from "~/components/layouts/ContainerDefault"; import HeaderDashboard from "~/components/shared/headers/HeaderDashboard"; function CreateBidPage() { const submitProduct = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("product submitted"); const categoryy = e.target.category.value; const product = { name: e.target.product.value, description: e.target.description.value, category: { tv: "category of all TV display", }, price: e.target.price.value, features: { width: e.target.width.value, height: e.target.height.value, color: e.target.color.value, weigth: e.target.weight.value, }, images: { main: e.target.image.value, }, merchant_id: "1", }; dispatch(addProduct(product)); }; return (
{/* PRODUCT IMAGE */}

); } export default CreateBidPage;
